duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the branch team to meet and exceed performance targets, ensuring operational excellence and providing exceptional customer experience.
Assume responsibility in the branch manager’s absence and play a key role in building and retaining customer relationships.
Help customers by discovering financial needs, processing transactions, resolving customer issues, opening new accounts, and offering convenience services.
Ensure strong knowledge of bank products and services and partner with appropriate specialists to serve customer's mortgage and investment needs.
Coach and develop the team, assist with sales coaching, and maintain operational soundness for the branch.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of applicable policies, procedures, guidelines, and bank operating systems and ensure compliance with federal, state, and local laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma, GED, or Foreign Equivalent
Bachelor’s Degree Preferred (Business or other related major)
